about_the_game:
Magic Night! Hop a magic carpet with your sweetheart and fly to the LoveBeat world!

[Contents]

It contains all of the following permanent items:

* Magic Carpet
- Hop the carpet with your sweetheart. You're able to sprinkle treasures on it.

* Aura of the rich
- Do you want to have a special aura? You can have your own aura with glittering gems.

* Holding Hands
- PDA! Walk and hold hands with your sweetheart in the game.

* 50000 Beat
- Beat is one of in-game currencies that can be used in various ways such as buying in-game items.

[Note]

1. You can view the DLC which you buy at in-game DLC page (Click “View My Information” > Click a down arrow button at the bottom left of the information page(diary)).
2. The pack is delivered to your inbox when you click a "Not Received" button at in-game DLC page above.
3. Items are deleted without any prior notice if you don't receive them from your inbox in their retention period.
